Reviews.Title: Brief Review
Reviews.Author: Cookie Monster
Reviews.Content: Most likely you have already read professional reviews of this item, so I will not repeat the list of features. Here are bits of info that I didn't find in reviews when I was shopping, and had hoped someone would post, along with a few surprises I found:1- Once you turn off the annoying start up tone, it takes less than a second to be ready, a big plus2- There is a zoom/focus ring. It is electronic, I would have preferred a mechanical one but it works well. Zoom or focus selectable by a switch3- The sweep panorama mode works well with the exception of the fact that it has a fixed width. If you don't sweep far enough within the allotted time, e.g. because you don't want too wide a panorama, the rest of the image will be filled with a grey filler. I hope a firmware update will fix this as it looks hideous.4- Macro photos are not the greatest.5- Ability to select the mode automatically works well.6- When powered on, the extending lens struggles if lens cover is still on. Would have been nice if it were removed automatically (too spoiled, I know)7- The included charger is an in-camera charger. It can power the camera for use and also while connected to a PC. To charge an extra battery, you'll need to buy a separate standalone charger. While connected to a PC, the camera charges the battery through the USB port.8- Great camera. Amazon and Beach Camera are outstanding.9- The bundle from Beach Camera is great (Make sure to get the one with the 16GB card)I like the camera and will definitely keep it for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Sony no Baloney
Reviews.Author: Lost Johnny
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our 40th anniversry celebration trip to Honolulu.  At first I was leary of the 30X magnification, knowing it is very difficult to get crystal clear pictures when magnifying an image 30X; but I soon learned that Sony's image stabalization technique was very proficient.  I was taking pictures from our 20th floor room lenai, of the Waikiki Marriot Beach Resort.  I took pictures of people surfing who were almost invisible with the naked eye, and the pictures came out so clear that we could tell what surfers were wearing, what colors their boards' were, and how badly they would wipe out.  We took pictures of boats and ships sailing by and could even clearly see the passengers on these cruise boats.  I could not believe how sharp and clear the pictures came out even when on full magnification--I was more than a little impressed.  Then we went to Wiamea Falls and I took about two hundred pictures of flowers and plants--I didn't have to do anything, just point and shoot and the camera did the rest.  You can see the little flecks of pollen on the flowers and the fine details are so clear it looks like pictures taken from a photography magazine.  Our next stop was the Honolulu Zoo where we got pictures of lions, and tigers, but no bears.  I used the movie mode and could not believe the quality of the image--just like watching a HD show on a HDTV.  We also went to the Aquarium and took many pictures of the marine life.  Again, it was amazing how clear and crisp the pictures came out--even when taking them though the glass aquarium tanks.  When we got home I started cropping pictures, because in many of them when you looked close you could see other marine life that went unnoticed when viewing the full picture.  We have roughly 1200 pictures that we will now choose the best and most representative of our trip.  Other people I have shown some of the pictures cannot believe that I took them--they look professionally done.  Thank you Sony for this great product--I look forward to years of more picture perfect pictures.  If there is a way for me to send you some of our pictures as a testament to my statements I would be more than happy to share.Randall B Miller

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: Kacey
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to replace an old Kodak.  I didn't want to go to a DSLR and have to deal with lenses so I thought this would be a good step up from my point and shoot.  I attend a LOT of concerts, and a lot of times, security gives you a hard time with what they call "professional" cameras that have removable lenses.  So I did a lot of research on this camera and the other cameras out there that are comparable to this one.  I decided to go with the Sony due to the fact that it had such a high megapixel (18.2) and long zoom (30x, but it actually zooms to 60x).  Used this camera at 2 concerts already and got absolutely amazing pictures!  Even in the low light concert setting.  The tracking focus keeps my pictures from being blurry.  Just attended the Kenny Chesney/Tim McGraw concert at the Georgia Dome and had lower level seats, and out of the 280 pics I took, only 4 ended up a little blurry.  The rest were crystal clear and the zoom on this camera is absolutely amazing!!  I also shoot lots of video at concerts and the videos I took with this camera are just unbelievable.  Great sound quality.  And I also like the fact that you can take pictures while shooting video.  I have also taken pictures of flowers and our pets in the back yard, and the clarity of those pictures in bright sunlight equals that of the DSLR's that my friends own.  I would HIGHLY recommend this camera to anyone who is thinking about purchasing it!!

Reviews.Title: Camera Great but issue with selector
Reviews.Author: Naz
Reviews.Content: This camera deserves a rating of 5 but was disappointed when I started using that the camera would automatically change the mode when taking a picture. When I checked the Sony website it was a known problem and also just purchased was not offering any good packages to have it repaired. This was disappointing I was now being asked to foot the entire bill to send the camera with no stipulated timeframe for repair, they indicated it may take months. I am now stuck with a brand new camera with a fault.

Reviews.Title: Bad Deal
Reviews.Author: gone8to1248 "BernardE"
Reviews.Content: For the mark-up in price to get the kit that comes with the camera is a waste of money. What you really get is a bunch of cheap trinkets. Buy the camera by itself and then buy one of the better kits for $39, where you actual get a good case and a real tri-pod. The camera is everything they same it is, the rest is a joke! Wouldn't recomend this package to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ibo
Reviews.Content: Very fast , bright and beautiful pictures without being an expert.The zoom is amazing, and the video very high qualityVery happy with this camera!!!

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: W. Majeran
Reviews.Content: Bought camera DSC-HX200V a month ago. Pictures are easy and amazing, no blurs, nice and sharp.little big long to change mode in pictures aqcuisition but numerous modes pre-adapted to different situations, and the possibility to change from pre-sets to manual are really a good thing.Also, back-light flash is a great feature  !I recommend it! very good camera for a bridge!PS; camera came in a budnle of accessories that are very usefull!

Reviews.Title: Good, but not right for me
Reviews.Author: netvisitorutah
Reviews.Content: Overall, I returned it.  The images were much less than I expected based on write-ups and reviews I've seen from others. I noted this most in regard to resolution, which was considerably less than I expected.  To be sure, there is a resolution price to pay for a long-zoom lens; however, I felt the resolution was considerably less than I would have expected even given that.  I also found the colors to be less true than I expected.I did quite a bit of searching before purchasing this camera, and in the mid-price range it certainly has many desirable features.But, in the end it is the final image which counts.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera from overseas and I received it within a week!  That is super service!The camera itself is fantastic, it does all that an amateur photographer wants from a camera.The kit is super as well, because you get all that you need for your camera at once and you do not have to shop for extra items.  The only thing that I would have liked to get in the kit is a separate charger; so that one can still use the camera even if the battery is charging.  I had to get a charger separately. My suggestion would be to include the charger in the kit and to keep the price in the same range, I would eliminate the lens cleaning stuff.

Reviews.Title: Really like the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V
Reviews.Author: VICTOR LUERAS
Reviews.Content: I'm a novice photographer and bought this Cyber-shot for under $400.  It came with all the accessories seen.  The 30x zoom is incredible.  I can shoot from the right field bleachers at a ballgame and get a clean, clear picture of the pitcher and/or batter.  The 18.2 MP is crystal clear.  Take a great shot, get the picture blown up, frame it and you have art for your home.  It's very intuitive as well.  You have to go online to read the manual but, a couple hours playing with the features you'll learn on your own.  It's pretty easy.  I like it only because it doesn't quite meet the Canon and Nikon's.  But, for a reasonably priced, easy to use, novice photographer it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Why a camera after having an iPhone?
Reviews.Author: Steve Rowles
Reviews.Content: My sister-in-law had this camera with her on a recent visit and the pictures she took were amazing. It does not have swappable lenses but you'd never know it with how great the digital zoom is on this beauty. Extremely light weight. Lots of pictures per charge. Very fast to power up. Lots of build in features that I still haven't gotten to them all. Very easy to view and delete pictures on the camera itself so as to not fill up the memory card with images you don't want to keep. I have loved the ease of using my iPhone but it's picture quality, although pretty good, doesn't hold a candle to this puppy.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Chillngroove
Reviews.Content: We just received this camera in the mail this week and have already used it on several occasions in different locations.  We had been using a point and shoot, but once it died, we wanted to step up.  We wanted something that could combine the ease of use of a point and shoot with the image quality and options of a fancier camera such as a SLR.  We are very impressed with this camera.  The speed is great, and the image quality is wonderful.  Amazing zoom, too.  I got a shot of a small sparrow on the top of a 3 storey house that turned out crystal clear and full of sharp detail.  It makes taking beautiful pictures easy.  There are a lot of different options (different scenes, panorama, etc), so if you get it for an upcoming event, give yourself some time to fiddle with it and get to know it.  You can take two pictures of the same thing using different options and come out with drastically different results. We bought it with the bundle or stuff and are very, very happy with it.  By all means read up on reviews from several sites to be sure you would be happy with a megazoom, but for us--and we are very picky about image and color--we are thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera--terrific HD video
Reviews.Author: Happy Mom "Happy Mom"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera to video and get sports shots of my daughter at her athletic events. This absolutely has exceeded my expectations. I am a total novice--and those who have lots of experience tell me that I did a great job choosing this one!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Proud mom of two
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing. I am just a mom who has two active girls and wanted to catch a few memories. I researched cameras and came up with this one. It takes amazing, beautiful pictures. The sports mode is awesome. I also took my daughters casual shots for her senior pictures and oh my I was asked to take casual senior shots of her friends. The camera is great. A friend of mine also bought this camera after seeing the pictures it takes. The video is amazing as well. Would recommend. Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: SUCH A GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Borda "Gabriela de Hasty"
Reviews.Content: To take pictures was never this easy. With this camera you can get great images, so you can print them as big as you want, getting wonderful prints that framed, look like very expensive paintings. Images are very clear, panoramic images are even better, and it is very simple to use. Anyone who enjoys photography can make a great purchase with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good features
Reviews.Author: fcfirecat
Reviews.Content: Overall, it is a nice camera with some cool features, but I sometimes like to look through the viewfinder when I take pictures.  With this camera, it is all distorted and doesn't serve any purpose at all.It takes great pictures using the zoom feature, but it does NOT take good night shots or fireworks shots.  I specifically bought this camera to take pictures while we were on vacation and especially for watching the Macy's fireworks in NYC.  I used the fireworks setting and was extremely disappointed.Some of the features are very confusing.  It's not really user friendly for the novice photographer.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA WITH ONE DRAWBACK.
Reviews.Author: mooncreeek
Reviews.Content: SONY REALLY OUT DID THEMSELVES WHEN THEY CREATED THE HX200V.  I LOVE IT BUT, IF YOU ARE NOT FAMILIAR WITH DIGITAL CAMERAS, YOU MAY FIND YOURSELF LOST WITH THIS BABY.  THIS PARTICULAR CAMERA HAS LOTS OF BELLS AND WHISTLES AND IT WILL TAKE SOME TIME TO LEARN ALL THAT IT CAN DO.  MY BIGGEST COMPLAINT WITH THIS CAMERA IS IT COMES WITH A SMALL INSTRUCTION MANUAL THAT DOES NOT COVER EVERYTHING.  YOU WILL HAVE TO GO TO THE SONY SITE TO ACCESS THE FULL MANUAL.  SINCE I DON'T CARRY MY LAPTOP EVERYWHERE I GO TO ACCESS THE MANUAL, I PRINTED IT.  A WORD OF CAUTION SHOULD YOU PRINT IT...HAVE LOTS OF PAPER AND LOTS OF INK AND THEN GO OUT AND GET A BINDER AND PUNCH.  FOR THE PRICE, SONY SHOULD HAVE INCLUDED A FULL MANUAL DESPITE THE AMOUNT OF CONTENT AND THIS IS THE ONLY REASON I GIVE IT 4 STARS RATHER THAN 5.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Wendi
Reviews.Content: This camera takes such clear pictures. I have captured some good pictures of my 3 year old daughter and that is really hard to do. Its not to heavey. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera
Reviews.Author: KulBhushan Prasad
Reviews.Content: Super Camera, I like this one and love the features in it. Very good Zoom and clearity is awasome.. The Best one in Point and Shoot ..

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Mauricio O.
Reviews.Content: I really have enjoyed this camera. Its price has worth and the product meet all my expectations !Great pictures...easy to use and not that big to carry....

Reviews.Title: Same as some SLR results
Reviews.Author: Memphis Don
Reviews.Content: Received in days after it was ordered.  It does everything Sony said it would and much more.  No need for written instructions, hit your menu and get any answer you want.For the money, it is an outstanding buy.  If you want to look and take pictures like a Prothis is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: great value for the money
Reviews.Author: C.K.P.
Reviews.Content: so far, I love the camera.  It is light weight, easy to use, but you can get more precise pics if you want.  It does all I want it to do.  Works great in low light.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade!
Reviews.Author: J. L. Dillehay "Loves to read"
Reviews.Content: I have had the Sony HX100V for a couple of years and saw the HX200V and bought it.  I am not disappointed, the camera is easy to use and has an awesome zoom and the pictures are awesome!  I took thousands of pictures with the 100 and expect to take at least that with the 200. I recommend this camera to anyone, simple to use and easy to learn.

Reviews.Title: What a deal and awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M. Martin
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photographer....I'm a grandmother who wanted a good camera to get great photos of my 1&1/2 year old grandson when he was in motion since I was tired of blurry pics of him in motion.  and I wanted far zoom and good pixel count.  So after much confusing research (I don't understand a majority of the technical jargon related to cameras) I settled on this one.  The deal that came with this camera was outstanding.  The camera itself:  I've always been a point and shoot camera gal so this camera was a little intimidating at first but didn't take much time to get used to.  The settings took a bit longer to get used to and I'm still figuring some out.  as far as the photos....unbelievable.  I'm so impressed.  I just got back from a vacation to Austin Tx and took the camera with me to "test it out".  I got some amazing shots from far, far away with awesome detail and video tape of the famous bats leaving the Congress bridge at dusk (famous sightseeing event in Austin nightly).  I could not be any happier with my choice.  I did order a separate batter charger to always have the other battery that came with the package deal charged and am going to purchase a shoulder strap for carrying since the neck strap included in the package was uncomfortable for me.  My daughter (who lives in Austin) is a future film director and used the camera and was blown away.  So if you are an average person who just wants a good camera for a decent price this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Lori Truncali
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for our vacation, this is a awesome camera. The pictures came out like post cards, and this camera basically does everything for you, if your looking for a camera, this is the one to buy.

Reviews.Title: Better Than I Expected For The Price
Reviews.Author: William T. Bailey
Reviews.Content: A really good camera.  Extremely easy to use for the novice photographer but has almost all of the features that I pro would use so you can adjust the settings to your level of expertise.  The quality of the images is amazing.  Even when displayed on a 50" plasma TV screen the color and sharpness are very impressive.  I especially like the zoom capability - better than any other digital camera I have owned.

Reviews.Title: Gift for wife
Reviews.Author: jm1959
Reviews.Content: Wife starting hobby and has not put camera down.  Great product with many features.  Need more detailed manual.  Excellent camera

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Josephine E. Baltazar
Reviews.Content: I bought it because I am planning to go on vacation later this September. Love the features. The zoom clarity is awesome. Took some nighttime shots of the moon on the night mode. The clarity is truly amazing! Took it to the race track (Santa Anita, Hollywood park, etc), clarity was also amazing! Love this camera! Easy to use but will take a photography class to really get to know it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Sierra Gilbert
Reviews.Content: The camera is beyond amazing, it makes me want to take more pictures. The quality of the photos is spectacular and there are so many different photo settings! This was a purchase worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: GMB and Wife
Reviews.Content: Works great love it. Have had no problems . Pictures that i have taken look great.Would tell everyone to buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: I like the picture clarity
Reviews.Author: Bhanu Prasad
Reviews.Content: Sony is absolutely the best when it comes to resolution. The picture was crystal clear and simple superb. Liked this camera a lot.

Reviews.Title: My super photographic camera
Reviews.Author: carolains
Reviews.Content: My camera has been the best, I like his size, is nice, makes spectacular shots, I'm very happy with my product. I love it, the only thing was that I'm late to Venezuela by problems shipping from Miami to Venezuela ...... Similarly, I am satisfied with my camera. Thanks ..

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade from a Point & Click
Reviews.Author: Bre
Reviews.Content: This is our first "real" camera.  The zoom is a little funny as the camera chooses what it wishes to focus on in most settings and unfortunately that is sometimes a twig, rather than a butterfly but all in all, the photo and video quality is excellent and the camera is very very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: sonycybercam
Reviews.Author: Vic C
Reviews.Content: I love this camera ...I'm no pro on camera's ...  I got to try it out at the Santa Monica Pier on Saturday.... I wanted a good camera without having to deal with lens changing ... gives great pictures .. I tried it out first by taking a picture from my front door of the Palm Springs Tram ... amazed of the zoom option .. I live about 14 miles from the tram (driving distance) I could see the trees at the top of the tram .... captures detail ... can't wait to take it to Sedona Az this summer .. I also loved that it came in a bundle pack .

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Constanza
Reviews.Content: It was very nice, good size, well done and in very good condition. It was what was shown. It was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Gabi
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional photographer but I do enjoy taking nice quality pics without so many complications. This cameras easy to use and takes great pics of us photographer amateurs.  I have an 8 month old who moves a lot and this camera captured her perfectly!!!! I'm really enjoying having this camera.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Nypepe
Reviews.Content: It's the second one that I bought.  I love that I can record a video and the same time took pictures.  The zoom it's extraordinary, I use for the concerts of my girls.  When they play violin in the orchestra I can take pictures and record a video and see her faces very close.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nola Brech
Reviews.Content: This is my second Sony bridge camera.  This was an upgrade from the one I bought 5 years ago.  It is the perfect camera for someone that wants more than a point and shot, but does not want to deal with a SLR.  I love it and it takes great pictures. Buy and enjoy!!!!

Reviews.Title: If your an average photographer with an average salary, look no further
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of great features besides the fact it takes incredible shots, not bad for a $400 dollar digital camera

Reviews.Title: Best ever Camera!
Reviews.Author: Fabs
Reviews.Content: Best camera and features. Better than expected, but it's an expensive no SLR.  It works great with bright light and at night could need more exposure. Size is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC HX200V 18.2 MP Camera bundle
Reviews.Author: A. Perez "ladybug"
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this camera, and the bundle that comes with it.  I love the camera.  It's AWESOME.  I am having so much fun taking pictures with it and exploring all the option and special effects.  It takes amazing pictures.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Pewrfect
Reviews.Author: Frank Bozic Jr.
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for, amazing camera and a lot of gadgets that work functional and attend all my necessities, really a complete package, amazing.

Reviews.Title: I have 8 digital cameras and this is the best of all
Reviews.Author: chubby
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful camera and a gret bargain from your company!!! I love the HDR in camera setting.Just every thing abou it is great..When I take a photo in the normal mode it looks it is real !!!Thank you so much for all the extras with itDonald Christy

Reviews.Title: More than a deal!
Reviews.Author: BZ
Reviews.Content: Whether you are a novice or an expert this camera should suit your needs.  I am no expert.  However, the pictures I took would make one think I am.

Reviews.Title: Great Digital camera and gadgets
Reviews.Author: Laura Mahecha
Reviews.Content: Loved the camera and all the gadgets that comes with it at a great price, I have been using it for over a year and everything is in perfect condition

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: armyvet1976
Reviews.Content: Just plainly great!!! A great buy!! This is just a great camera! I love it and so does my wife!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Gray
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for a while now and absolutely LOVE it!  It is easy to use, takes exceptional pictures, and is so far one of the best cameras I have ever purchased!  Certainly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V
Reviews.Author: Chas
Reviews.Content: Still a lot to learn and try out, but this is the best camera I have ever had.  The pictures it takes are clear and sharp.

Reviews.Title: Great camera Decent price
Reviews.Author: dmann
Reviews.Content: Bought this on a whim before a vacation. Camera takes superior pictures and beyond meets expectations for the price I paid

Reviews.Title: buenisima
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: esta cámara es buenísima, la calidad de las imágenes y los vídeos es espectacular, el zoom no distorsiona la nitidez de las fotos, tengo poco tiempo con ella pero lo que la he usado ella misma indica si estas cometiendo un error.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX280 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 20x Image Stabilized Zoom 25mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full-HD Video (Black) Pro Package With 16gb card , case , cleaning kit , tripod , spare battery
